description:
This is actually a fully responsive site. Preview it here: https://pooja.makers.so


Pooja is a makers.so template ready to use. Makers is a Figma Plugin to go from Figma to site with one click. 


Simply duplicate this file, install makers and turn it into a site with only one click. Then, tweak the design, make it your own and publish to your own custom domain. 


This design was inspired by the digital creator Pooja. Go give her a follow at Instagram: she is @poojasinhaa
